fields.name: Who we are
fields.value: We are the Hollins Eco Anarchist Collective, made up of Richard of Hollins, an ambling beardsman and occasional wordsmith and M‚Äôcolleague Spaniel L. Jackson, The Dog

fields.name: What we do
fields.value: Post stuff about ambling and nature so as to overthrow the neoliberal hegemony and establish a fairer, greener society based on co-operation and respect
